response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. We are willing to sell this product to you for $11,500. This price not only reflects the high quality and functionality of the product but also provides you with significant savings compared to the market rate. I trust that this investment will pay off in numerous ways for your company. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 11500}
